Features

Everything You Need for Video Conversion

A complete toolkit for converting video aspect ratios and formats. Built for content creators, marketers, and developers.

Core Features

100% Local Processing

Your videos never leave your device. All conversion happens locally, ensuring complete privacy.

Lightning Fast

Powered by FFmpeg, the industry-standard video processing engine. Hardware acceleration supported.

No Cloud Required

Works completely offline. No internet connection needed after installation.

CLI Support

Automate your workflow with our powerful command-line interface. Perfect for batch processing.

Multiple Interfaces

Use the desktop app, web dashboard, or CLI — whatever fits your workflow best.

No Account Needed

Download and use immediately. No sign-up, no login, no tracking.

Transform Modes

Fit

Preserves entire video, adds letterbox bars

Fill

Crops to fill frame completely

Stretch

Stretches to fit (may distort)
